byline.contributor: THAILAND already online; please do not republish.

lead_paragraph: A group of female peace advocates, including Gloria Steinem and two Nobel laureates, arrived Tuesday in Pyongyang for a march across the Demilitarized Zone this weekend.

headline.print_headline: Asia; North Korea: Group to Cross DMZ
headline.main: North Korea: Group to Cross DMZ

snippet: A group of female peace advocates, including Gloria Steinem and two Nobel laureates, arrived Tuesday in Pyongyang for a march across the Demilitarized Zone this weekend.
abstract: Group of female peace advocates, including Gloria Steinem and two Nobel laureates, arrive in Pyongyang for march across Korean Demilitarized Zone.
